welcome.title: Welcome
welcome.description: Discover Zéphyre, your versatile platform that combines innovative services and unique experiences. Explore our different sections to learn more about our projects.

gaming.title: Gaming
gaming.description: Join our gaming community with our premium Minecraft server. Explore infinite worlds and live epic adventures with other players.

tech.title: Technologies
tech.description: Our projects are powered by modern technologies: Kubernetes, Docker, and cloud-native infrastructures for optimal performance.

about.title: About Zéphyre
about.description: Zéphyre is a modern digital platform offering innovative services and a dynamic community. Our mission is to create exceptional digital experiences.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.content: Provide innovative and accessible digital solutions for everyone.

values.title: Our values
values.content: Quality, innovation, and kindness are at the heart of everything we do.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Contact us
contact.description: A question? A suggestion? Feel free to write to us!
